title-group.article-title: Overview of Geomagnetic Shielding Effects Against Cosmic Radiation

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1998 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: The concept of geomagnetic cutoff rigidities is presented in relation to the determination of radiation dosage from galactic cosmic rays and solar proton events. Examples for both aircraft routes and spacecraft orbits are presented.
